verse.name: v1
verse.lines: Everyone knows someone we'd be better off without, But best not mention names for we don't know who's about But why commit a murder and risk the fires of hell, When black widows in the privy can do it just as well.

verse.name: v2
verse.lines: Now poison's good, and daggers, and arrows in the back, And if you are really desperate you can try a front attack, But are they really worthy of the risk of being caught When black widows in the privy need not be bribed or bought?

verse.name: v3
verse.lines: So if there's one, of whom you wish most simply to be rid, Just wait until dark then point the way to where the widow is hid, spoken:"I think you'll find that this one is the best." And black widows in the privy will gladly do the rest.
